Interface SMTPDeliveryAgentConfig

    SMTPClientConfig
    All Known Implementing Classes:

    public interface SMTPDeliveryAgentConfig
extends SMTPClientConfig
    Configuration which is used to deliver email via SMTP
    Author:
    Norman Maurer

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Authentication getAuthentication()
      Return the Authentication to use or null if none should be used
      String getHeloName()
      Return the name which will get used for the HELO/EHLO
      SMTPDeliveryAgentConfig.PipeliningMode getPipeliningMode()
      Return SMTPDeliveryAgentConfig.PipeliningMode if the client should use PIPELINING if possible
